hero.title: Product Designer with a background in Psychology
hero.bio: I went from questions to screens to make the complex simple. I believe design isn't about Figma or the trendiest software, but about defining objectives, asking the right questions and finding solutions that improve the user experience. I'm currently exploring AI integrations in my workflow to optimize processes and speed up delivery with functional solutions and attractive designs.

experience.title: Experience
experience.intro: I combine my background in psychology with my experience in consulting projects to strengthen design team workflows, improving collaboration, decision-making processes, and communication.

formation.title: Education
formation.intro: Academic background, certifications and courses. I'm currently studying AI integrations and vibe coding; I enjoy bringing designs to life.
